# AI Agents

This directory contains AI agent configurations for automated development tasks.

## Files

- **agent.md** - General agent configuration and guidelines
- **agent-script.js** - Agent automation scripts
- **block-theme-build.agent.js** - Build automation agent script
- **block-theme-build.agent.md** - Build agent documentation

## Purpose

These agents help automate:

- Build process optimization
- Code quality checks
- Documentation generation
- Test automation

## Usage

Agents are invoked automatically by compatible AI development tools and GitHub Actions workflows.
